SELECT cr.board_id, cr.id, m.id AS member_id, bb.bbno AS bookboard_bbno, cr.roomid, cr.created_day, bb.id AS bookboard_id, bb.title, bb.thumbnail, m.name FROM ChatRoom cr INNER JOIN BookBoard bb ON cr.bbno = bb.bbno INNER JOIN member m ON m.id = bb.id WHERE cr.id = #{id} OR cr.board_id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM ChatRoom WHERE id = #{id} AND board_id = #{board_id} AND bbno = #{bbno}

mapper.select: SELECT b.roomId, b.id, b.board_id, b.bbno, b.created_day, c.name from ChatRoom b INNER JOIN MEMBER c ON c.id =b.id where b.id like #{id} and b.board_id like #{board_id} and b.bbno = #{bbno}
SELECT b.roomId, b.id, b.board_id, b.bbno, b.created_day, c.name FROM ChatRoom b INNER JOIN MEMBER c ON c.id = b.id WHERE b.id LIKE #{id} AND b.board_id LIKE #{board_id} AND b.bbno LIKE #{bbno}

SELECT a.roomId, a.writer, a.message, a.created_day, c.name, b.board_id, b.bbno FROM Chat_Messages a INNER JOIN ChatRoom b ON a.roomid = b.roomid INNER JOIN MEMBER c ON c.id = a.writer WHERE b.id = #{id} AND b.board_id = #{board_id} AND b.bbno = #{bbno} ORDER BY a.created_day ASC
